code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./Navbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[scrolled,setScrolled]=useState(false);const[mobileMenuOpen,setMobileMenuOpen]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{if(window.scrollY>50){setScrolled(true);}else{setScrolled(false);}};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:`navbar ${scrolled?'scrolled':''}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#home",children:"TRAINMIAMI"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mobile-menu-icon",onClick:()=>setMobileMenuOpen(!mobileMenuOpen),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:`nav-menu ${mobileMenuOpen?'active':''}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#home",onClick:()=>setMobileMenuOpen(false),children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#services",onClick:()=>setMobileMenuOpen(false),children:"Services"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#about",onClick:()=>setMobileMenuOpen(false),children:"About"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#contact",onClick:()=>setMobileMenuOpen(false),children:"Contact"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"cta-button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#join",onClick:()=>setMobileMenuOpen(false),children:"Start Training"})})]})]})});};export default Navbar;
